title: [GAMEPLAY] Rek'sai Sated Devourer + Q Bug
body:
1. Play {{champion:421}} with {{summoner:11}} 
2. Aquire Sated Devourer and Red Buff
3. Use Q and basic attack 

As you see Red Buff (and debuffs like it) is applied to yourself when phantom hit and Q is proc'ed

replies.body:
I believe this is fixed in ~~5.24.~~ the next patch. 

Edit: Either 5.25 or 6.1
I'm sure everyone is wondering the same, so do you mean a mini patch or patch 6.1?

He means whatever patch is next. Right now there probably isn't a 5.24b/5.25 planned, which would make it 6.1, but if a hotfix is required for something else this will be shipped alongside the hotfix.

I figured as much; just wanted it written out.  
This in-game interaction is going to confuse the heck out of people that don't read the boards :^)

The real question is, why are you using devour on rek'sai.

She has no synergy with the item at all.
